description: OpenAI is an artificial intelligence research and deployment company focused on developing safe and beneficial artificial general intelligence (AGI) that benefits all of humanity. The company is known for its advanced AI models and products, including ChatGPT, Sora, and the OpenAI API platform.
sub_industry: AI Research, Generative AI, Machine Learning
key_products_services: GPT-4o, GPT-4.5, GPT-4.1, o3, o4-mini models
business_model: OpenAI generates revenue through subscription services (e.g., ChatGPT Plus, ChatGPT Pro), enterprise contracts (ChatGPT Enterprise), API usage fees, and licensing its AI models and platforms to businesses and developers. It also partners with government and defense agencies for AI solutions.
target_customer: Businesses of all sizes, developers, enterprises seeking AI-powered solutions, government agencies, and individual consumers interested in advanced AI applications.
mission_statement: OpenAI’s mission is to ensure that artificial general intelligence (AGI)—highly autonomous systems that outperform humans at most economically valuable work—benefits all of humanity. The company is committed to conducting cutting-edge research and deploying AI in a way that is safe, secure, and beneficial for society as a whole.
